sentences.en: But your father stands in the way because of certain unrealistic scruples.
sentences.cn: 但是你爸爸因为一些不切实际的清规戒律就踟蹰不前,阻碍了生意的前进.

sentences.en: Don't be so bookish and unrealistic.
He found he couldn't string along with their unrealistic notions.
sentences.cn: 他感到不能同意他们的不切实际的想法.

sentences.en: He said they were unrealistic and steeped in the past.
sentences.cn: 他说他们脱离现实，总是沉浸在过去。

sentences.en: I'm not opposed to a core curriculum in principle, but I think requiring a foreign language is unrealistic.
sentences.cn: 原则上我不反对设置基础课程，但我认为要求掌握一门外语是不现实的。

sentences.en: In fact, the rules were as unrealistic as they were archaic.
sentences.cn: 实际上这些规章既陈旧又不现实。

sentences.en: In practice the rules were as unrealistic as they were archaic.
sentences.cn: 实际上这些规章既陈旧又不现实.

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to believe perfection is an attainable goal.
sentences.cn: 相信完美可以企及是不现实的。

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to expect them to be able to solve the problem immediately.
sentences.cn: 指望他们能够立即解决问题是不现实的。

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to put undue pressure on ourselves by saying we are the best.
sentences.cn: 说我们是最好的是给自己施加过多的压力，这种做法不切实际。

sentences.en: Most of us have formed an unrealistic picture of life on a desert island.
sentences.cn: 我们中多数人对荒岛生活都有过不现实的想法.

sentences.en: Some parents have totally unrealistic expectations of teachers.
sentences.cn: 有些家长对老师抱着完全不切实际的期望。

sentences.en: The city has unrealistic pretensions to world-class status.
sentences.cn: 这个城市不切实际地标榜自己为国际都市。

sentences.en: The film is spoilt by unrealistic contrivances of plot.
sentences.cn: 这部电影被不实际的牵强情节给毁了。

sentences.en: There are many who feel that the players are being completely unrealistic in their demands.
sentences.cn: 很多人都觉得这些球员的要求是完全不现实的。

sentences.en: This is an unrealistic dream for a young boy like you.
sentences.cn: 你年纪轻轻,不要老做白日梦.

trans.tran_cn: 不切实际的，不现实的，空想的，不实在的
trans.tran_en: unrealistic ideas or hopes are not reasonable or sensible
